title: Help ....My toxicity is off the charts
body: Does anyone have any recommendations im so toxic in this game its not funny at all , and iv tryed to be a better player everytime but after a couple weeks it comes back and i have tryed to calm down and say its just a game and realise that there are people on the other side but when people say im trolling from 1 death or are doing bad and dont know what there doing it kills me i need help to cure this please. any ideas? (other than uninstalling xD)

replies.body:
OK, here is your fool proof 2-step process that will make EVERY SINGLE GAME calm and relaxing to you, without anyone tilting you. Trust me, its fail safe:

Step 1: Mute all at the beginning of the game. Don't type anything, don't tell them they're muted, just mute all. Nobody is required to type. There's a ping for everything needed to communicate.

Step 2: Unbind your Return key in the settings. Actually you only have to do step 2 once, because once it's unbound, it remains unbound, but that also means you can't open the chat window to type, and will not have the chance to be toxic. 

You're welcome.
IIRC, the enter key doesn't have a bind. I've been advocating people use AutoHotKey for the purpose. Is this no longer necessary?

the mute button works great.  if you know they dont know as much as you no point in listening to someone who is useless in that regard so they are no benefit you or the team so their input is not needed to win. also i would make a smurf account to play on for a year to have your warning level to go down just to be safe. for the record dont play teemo it tilts the hell out of people. i would already be in a bad mood seeing that crap in the top/mid lane. almost always reported

i have a question tho im already on my 15 day suspension and im unsuspended in 4 days what happens if my team reports me for trolling and im not (edit. i played teemo once and i died 2 times and i got reportee for trolling and also they reported me because i went to go gank ori lane annie auto bursted me when i said i was coming and ori did nothing thats how i got 15 suspension) edit once again we won anyways u can check my match history

If your team reports you for trolling, and you weren't, you don't have anything to worry about.

That said, *be careful*. If you get any punishment whatsoever after coming off the 2 week ban, it'll be a permanent. If I were you, I'd be very wary of chatting at all. Don't trash talk, don't try to be funny, don't complain, just play the game. Don't put a single word in the chatbox unless it's unambiguously positive.
Thanks guys! ill try to do everything you said and see if it helps

If you have a hard time with spur of the moment raging into the chat box, I'd suggest a tool to disable your enter key in game.

Instructions here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ghKQoeu8-how-to-unbind-your-enter-key-to-prevent-inadvertent-toxicity

I have never been toxic in game or out of game but when i first started playing i was rude, but what i did was just said whatever i was going to say by talking out loud, like last game i played there was a player who made a dumb decision, i said Dumb ass Talking but not typing it

1. gain some self control.
2. just mute everyone and play
3. at some point you actually will have to realize its just a game and what people say don't mean anything unless you let it.
4. take an anger class?
5. take a break for a couple hours or however long
Realize that insulting people solves nothing and realize that most people playing poorly aren't feeding on purpose, we just all have bad games.
